Is getting even more pregnant. Her maxed out belly and womb began to expand bigger. Then her legs started to fill with digieggs. Little by little the rest of her body started to expand with digieggs. Soon when her whole body is maxed out, she stopped producing digieggs. By now Kari looked like a big, round digiegg herself.

"Sora the sack broke." Kari moaned. "I'm going into labor."

"Okay, its going all right Kari." Sora replied while rubbing Kari's overly swollen body.

Then Sora pressed a button near the bed and three elecmon entered the room as fast as they could.

"You'll have to wait outside the miss." Said one of the elecmon. "We don't know how many eggs could come out so this could get messy."

"I didn't even know humans could get pregnant with digieggs." Replied another elecmon.

2 weeks.” Another elecmon said.

         Meanwhile Yolei was just shocked at how big she was even though she had dreamed of being like this for awhile now. Her hands were glued to her belly ,trying to calm the babies inside as they kicked in every direction. Despite her amazement and joy she gained from the feeling of life inside her Yolei felt exhausted and fell asleep, her hands still rubbing her stretched womb.

         Returning from the kitchen with the bottle and a plate of food for her unborn children Kari was surprised to see that Yolei had fallen asleep even though the it was only the middle of the day. Taking a seat next to her sleeping friend she began eating her food and …

153.content:
Kari was sitting on her bed, very bored. She was bare foot, and was twiddling with her feet to pass the time. "Hmm...I wonder what it would be like if my feet were a bit bigger...or a lot bigger, for that matter." Kari wiggled her toes. "I wish I could find out..." she says.

Suddenly, Kari's feet begin to glow. Before she can react, her feet begin to grow and swell. Kari giggles. "Well, I asked for it..." she says, as she watches in amazement. In about a minute, her feet were around 10 times their normal size. Then, they stopped growing.

"How odd..." Kari said, poking at her newly grown feet. She manages to slide herself out of the bed. "I'm gonna have to get a whole new pair of shoes...if they even make them in my size." she says.

"I wish they could have gotten much bigger than that, thought." Kari says, as she suddenly gasps and covers her mouth. But it's too late. Kari's feet began to grow again...
153.title: Wishes Do Come True.

1531.content:
Thinking quickly, Kari manages to get herself to the window in her apartment and hang her feet outside just before they get too big to fit through them. Kari watches in amasement as her feet grow to the size of a couple of large cars. "Hehehe...how nice. But I think people will get concerned if they see a pair of gigantic feet sticking out of a window...alright, here it goes."

Kari pauses, making sure to carefully word her wish. "Ok, I wish my feet were returned to the size they were before they got this big." Kari watches as her feet shrink back to the the size they were before the second wish. Once they're small enough, she pulls them back inside. "There we go..." Suddenly, Kari hears footsteps, and then a knock on the door.
1531.title: Bigger, then back to big.

choices: Try to keep her from knowing.
15311.content:
Kari's mom, who we'll call Kamiya from now on, calls to her from outside the door. "Kari? Are you ok in there? I heard a couple of loud thumps in your room, and one just now as I was coming to check on you."

"Yeah, mom. I'm just fine..." Kari said. She then contemplated admiting that she just wished her feet to a larger size. {Well, I'm sure she wouldn't punish me for having giant feet...and she might even be amused by it.} Kari thought. {She's more than likely punish me if I didn't tell her, anyway...}
15311.title: Kamiya interupts.

153111.content:
"...in fact, mom, why don't you come in so I can show you what WAS making those thumping noises?" Kari says, deciding to avoid the risk of lying.

And sure enough, Kamiya opens the door and walks in, the first thing catching her eye is Kari's large feet. "O-oh! What happened to your feet!?" Kamiya stammers, as she gazes at them in a combination of amazement and shock.

"I made my feet bigger just by wishing them that way. I don't know why, I just said I wished what it would be like if my feet were bigger, and boom! I suddenly had pillow-sized feet! Isn't is amazing?"

Kamiya blinks. "Amazing isn't the word for it, but...do you think I could try as well?" Kamiya said, grinning a bit.

Kari nods. "I don't see what it could hurt..." Kari says, even though she realizes that Kamiya might try to use it against her.

"Ok...I wish my feet can get as big as Kari's!" Kamiya says, as Kari's eyes widen a bit. {Uh oh! Can? But my feet can so far get as big as cars!"} Kari thinks to herself.
153111.title: Kamiya tries to wish.

1531111.content:
Kamiya looks down and grins as she sees her feet burst out of her socks. She lifts up her foot a bit and wiggles her slowly fattening toes. "Ooooh...it feels a nice as it looks..." Kamiya says. Kari just backs up as Kamiya's feet continue to grow, filling up more and more space in the room. Kamiya, however, doesn't seem to mind that her feet are starting to fill up the room. She giggles a little as her feet end up growing until they're just barely wall-to-wall.

Kari just squirms as she finds herself pinned to one of the walls by the big toes on each of Kamiya's massive feet. "Well, at least they fit in the room..." Kari says.

"Ahh...this is nice...but it's not much fun when we can't move around, huh? Let's see what we should do about that..." Kamiya says, thinking about what to do next...
1531111.title: Kamiya can mess with feet too.

"Oh, wait I know." Kamiya closed her eyes and concentrated. "I wish we were someplace else!" and with a poof both Kari and a mother had disapeared.
A few minuets later and Kamiya and Kari suddenly appeared in a wherehouse-like area that resembled the inventing room in Willy Wonka's Chocolate Factory. Weird devices and machines dotted the walls and all around the floor. Kamiya, (with her feet still huge) stood at one end of the room, and Kari stood at the other.
15311111.title: Kari and Kamiya's Chocolate Factory

choices: Make Kari into multiple Oompa-Loompa versions of herself.
153111111.content:
"Wow...isn't this the inventing room from your favorite movie, mom?" asks Kari.

Kamiya looks around a bit, and nods. "I didn't even say where, but out of all the places, this is the one I've always wanted to be in the most...oh, I hope everything actually works as it should." she says, with a look of child-like amazement.

Knowing what happens in this room, it doesn't take Kari long to figure out why her mother is so happy to be here. "Ooh, so are you going to make yourself into a blueberry? You always seemed to really like that scene in particular, and now I know why, too. At least, I think so, unless you have other plans."

Kamiya gives a smile and nods to Kari. "That's exactly right, Kari, I finally have a chance to live my dream of making myself into a big blueberry, just like Violet. It always looked like so much fun, even if the girl never saw it that way."

"Hehe, I bet she got used to it once she was off screen. Even I thought it was a pretty interesting." says Kari.

Kamiya nods, and then motions to her car-sized feet. "And won't it be more interesting to also have huge feet too?"

"Oooh...you don't have to tell me twice, mom. Go for it!" excitedly exclaims Kari, eager to see what exactly that would yield.

"Alright then, I wish I was a blueberry person as wide as my feet are long!" shouts Kamiya. The moment she finishes, her body starts to turn a nice shade of blue. To Kari and Kamiya's amusement, her feet are the first to turn blue, followed by the rest of her. The actual bloating starts with her midsection, very bottom-heavy at first. Kamiya grins as she watches and feels her bloating body spread out along her feet. As she continues, she starts to take on more of a pear shape, which is slowly becoming more round each moment. She can't help but press her hands against herself, just to feel how soft and squishy she's becoming. "Mmm...this is even better than I imagined it would be..." she says, as her body gets about as round as it can get.

Kari giggles as she watches Kamiya bloat. "Oooh, looking good so far, mom, and you're just barely halfway there!" she exclaims, excited by how big her mom is going to end up. After another minute or so, Kamiya has bloated to 15 feet wide, her body pressing against her equally large feet.

"Mmm...I did it Kari...I've become a massive blueberry, with really big blueberry feet, too. It really is amazing, isn't it?" says Kamiya.

Kari grins, and looks Kamiya over. "Oh yeah, you look fantastic, mom, you really do." she says, after which she goes over to her and hugs as much of her as she can. "As weird as this may be, it really is fun to watch."

"Good...then how about we make it more fun, then?" asks Kamiya.
153111111.title: Old Fantasy meets New Fantasy

"Let's make you into a big blueberry person just like me, Kari." says Kamiya.

Kari's grin practically goes ear-to-ear. "Oh! Hehe, ok, ok, let's see...I wish I was just like mom!" Kari giggles, then lets out a joyful squeal as she feels her feet starting to grow larger first, becoming more blue as they do so. "Hehe, I was wondering how this would go. What a great way to start!" exclaims Kari as her feet grow outward until they're just as large as before, before her body starts to go through the same thing that Kamiya's did. Though because Kari's body is smaller, Kari gets to the point where she's just growing bigger much sooner than Kamiya did. "Mmm...yeah...bigger...bigger!" she says, seeming to particularly enjoy this part. She's almost a little disappointed when she reaches the same size as Kamiya.

"Aww...I'm not getting any bigger now...but wow...I'm really just as big as you, mom!" says Kari, as excited as she can be. "And my feet...hehe...so wonderful!"

Kamiya smiles as she thinks of what to do next.
1531111112.title: Mother and Daughter as Blueberries.

"OK, but it better be goo.."THUMP"

As Tai tilted his head upward, a long, clear plastic pipe slid down from the celing and into his mouth. He wouldv'e tried to get away but he ran the risk of choking himself and besides his feet were too broad and heavy for him to move anyway. She knew that in the movie, the children who were punished each embodied several of the deadly sins, and Augustus Gloop was portrayed as the sin of gluttony. Even Kari had to admit that this was going to extreams but that's why she had asked her mother first, and besides, Kari had always wondered what Tai would look like with some serious meat on his bones.

The pipe retracted into the ceiling and Kari breathed a sigh of relief as she reminded herself that these effects were reversable, but in the meantime, he once slender Tai had been replaced by what appeared to be a gelatinous blob of pudding with Tai's clothing stretched to the breaking point over it. His dizzy, moaning face had about six chins and looked like it was floatin in a sea of fat. From about his shoulders down to his waist, Tai had spread out to a width of about two sumo wrestlers, and his shirt had been pulled up to show his bellybutton. What was really a site was Tais lower half. Thankfully he still had his pants on, but his legs no longer looked like legs anymore, but massive pllars of flesh that spilled out and covered his giant feet up to his toes.

"Oh, ladies? Could you come ove here fo a minuete please." Yolie, Sora and Mimi gathered around with puzzled looks.

"What's up Kari, and what's with the gizmo?" Yolie asked. "Well, to keep everyone from getting bored, Mom and I thought up some games to play that the numemon agreed to help us with. The games have to do with Charlie and the Chocolate Factory. Has everyone seen that movie or read the book?" Everybody noded. Kari continued "Well, to start we need a volunteer. Sora you'll do fine." She took Sora by the hands and led her over till she was right in front of the machine. Then Kari pulled a lever on the control panel and the machine spurred to life. Mimi and Yolie saw it but said nothing as they both assumed that this was part of the game.

"So, Kari?" Sora asked "What exactly does this thing doooooooo?" The pipe suddenly began to suck air into it and Sor as well! She was lifted right off the floor and up into the suspended pipe. Right as she entered, Sora's arms were pinned to her sides and her legs were forced together. She looked like an action figure that hadn't been taken out of it's packaging yet. However, Sora wasn't completely covered in pipe and her sneaker-clad feet were hanging out of the bottom.

"Now for step two." Kari said as she pushed another button. Suddenly, a ray-machine looking device popped out of the top of the machine and began to project a purple colored field of light over Sora's sneakers, which immediately began to strain and rip with the new burden that they were carying. A second or two later her sneakers and socks had ripped to shreds as a result of Sora's much larger feet, which now needed a yardstick to be measured properly. A few more seconds and Sora was every bit as large as Kamiya was. The shadow that Sora cast was now big enough to cover all the girls at once. Yolie and Mimi, didn't know wheather to be concerned or to laugh. Kari noticed this and put their minds to rest. "Don't worry guys. It's not like she can't breathe up there. Now come along and follow my lead.

At this point, Kamiya had gotten behind a keyboard looking device and started playing out a prerecorded melody. The numemon hummed and danced rythmicaly in the background and the girls circled Sora and started to sing, following Kari's lead:

1531111121212111.content:
Once the girls are finished having their fun with Sora, they stop tickling her. Sora lets her feet hang down from where they are in order to relax them after the extensive tickling they endured. Kari and Kamiya then turn to Mimi and Yolei.

"Now, the next part is where Violet grows into a blueberry girl, so for this next part a little more than your feet are going to get big. Which one of you would be interested?" Kamiya asks with a big grin on her face.

Yolei giggles, steps forward, and raises her hand. "Ever since I saw that movie, I've always wanted to do something like this!" she exclaims.

This makes Kamiya laugh a little. "My, my, you're very eager to get turned into a big-footed blueberry. Hehe, alright, then, I suppose you know the drill then!" Kamiya says as one of the Numemon moves over to Yolei with a piece of gum in his hand. Yolei grins, then grabs the gum and stuffs it into her mouth in one quick movement. "Mmm...it already tastes like blueberry..." Yolei says, as she starts to turn blue.

Kari blinks and looks up at her mother. "Hey, what happened to the three-course gum?" she askes, slightly puzzled.

"I figured that since we already know what's going to happen, we wouldn't need the suspence that the three-course gum would normally have." Kamiya says, as she motions over to Yolei. As she starts to bloat up, she gets a huge grin on her face between chews.

"Mmmm...I wonder which Violet I'm going to end up like..."

Yolies' body had almost completely filled out at this point. Her arms had taken on a sasuage-like quality even though they were slowly becoming a part of her, the same with her legs. Her shoulders and neckline seemed to be bunching up around her head, as as you can guess, all of her visable skin as well as all of her clothing had turned the color of a pure blueberry.
Despite this intriging spectacle, Mimi seemed a little disapointed.
Mimi: I don't get it. Shouldn't she be bigger?
Kamiya: In one version perhaps, but with the formula in that particular gum, she'll probably be more manageable.

Mimi seemed satisfied with this explanation and turned back to the show. By now, Yolie had become a complete blueberry. Just a large, rounded, blue ball, with a seemingly tiny head on top, a pair of flipper-like arms and a bulging pair of sneakers on the bottom. Aparently, Yolie wasn't finished with her transformation as her shoes strained and eventually ripped down the seems leaving her blue feet bare. They stopped their expansion when they reached the desired size, which was the same as Kamiya since they had done the same to Sora. (ie: the length of surfboards and as wide as a couch cushion.)

Kamiya: Alright, girls. Since we followed the old model, we should follow the older style of music.

And so it began, Kari, Mimi, and Kamiya stood in a triangular formation around Yolie. 15311111212121112.content:
Kari giggles and gives Yolei a poke as she bloats up well past 5 feet wide. The blueberrified girl giggles as she's poked, and sloshes a little from all the juice she's filling up with. Yolei keeps bloating up with juice until she's towering over the girls and the Numemon at an impressive 25 feet wide.

"Ahhhhh...this is so great...I'm actually taking part in my favorite scene in the whole movie as the reason why it's my favorite scene to begin with." Yolei says as she flaps her hands up and down. As with Violet in the 2005 movie, the shape of Yolei's body resembles that of a real blueberry.

Kari smiles. "Hehe, you've always had a thing for totally weird stuff, Yolei. I bet the wish we made hasn't affected you once, just because you would have willingly gone along with this anyway." Yolei simply nods.

"I'm glad you're actually enjoying this, Yolei, because now it's time to bloat up your feet and move on to the next song!" Kamiya says, walking over to Yolei. When she gets over to her, Kamiya gently rubs Yolei's blueberry surface. "And of course, having a huge body calls for really huge feet."

Kamiya motions to the numemon, who are ready with ray. Once she steps out of the way, the numemon fire the ray at Yolei's feet, which causes them to enlarge Yolei's feet just like they had Sora's. Mimi and Kari watch from where they are while Sora watches from the tube as Yolei's feet grow until each one is as tall as her body.

Yolei grins and shakes off the last bits of her shoes and socks off her massive blueberry-colored feet. "Oooh...nice...hey, you think I could lead the song? I know the kids don't normally do it in the movie, but I think I though up a really good parody of the song from the movie! So can I?" Yolei asks, which surprises Kari and Kamiya a little.

"Ooh...I don't know...that's kind of odd..." Kamiya says.

This just makes Kari giggle. "Oh, come on, mom, she practically deserves it for being such a good sport about this without our wish forcing her!"

Kamiya shrugs. "Alright, but it better be a good parody, or we're going to tickle you twice as hard!" she says. "Now...I wish me, Kari, and everyone else would be able to preform the song Yolei is thinking about!" Kamiya says.

153111112121211121.content:
Just as Sora was left a front row seat for the ensuing entertainment,Yolie was given one too when her turn was finished. Yolie was rolled up next to Sora and placed in a sitting position next to Soras' plastic tube and leaned up against the wall for support. The two turned their heads to look at each other to confirm that they were alright. Sora actually looked a little thinner, and Yolies cheeks were fading back to their bluish color after being red from the laughter.

"Well, were halfway through and this has been a lot of fun.." started Mimi "..but I really don't see how we can act out the last scene, even if we all agree that I should be the star." she said with a little twirl and a movie star glint in her eye. "Don't worry Mimi." said Kamiya, shuffling over and putting an arm over her shoulder. "With the equipment we have here, anything is possible, and as long as the Numemon are here to help, we should be fine. In fact..." Kamiya pulled a long silver flute out of her pocket and played a few notes on it. In the blink of an eye, dozens of Numemon had surrounged Mimi. "Uh oh." Mimi said in mock fear. "Although I don't know what is going to happen, I think I know what comes next."

The Numemon pounced on Mimi from all sides and grabbed her around the arms and legs.Then the gelatenous digimon began to drag Mimi toward the center of the room. "Ok, Kari pull the red lever on the floor next to you." ordered Kamiya. Kari found the lever and did as she was instructed.

A gaping hole opened up in the floor right where the Numemon stopped in there tracks. Mimi tilted her head up to get a better look and smiled in anticipation. Thankfully, she was still under the affects of the wish or she probably would've started screaming. After a "One, two, three", the Numemon tossed Mimi through the air and face-first into the hole. "Mom! Are you crazy?! What do.. you...?" Kari took a second look and slowed to a stop. Mimi was suspended in mid-air,upside-down,positioned a little below the mouth of the hole. "Let me guess Mom. Anti-Gravity field?" asked Kari, after she had calmed down. Kamiya winked at her and nodded.

"Ok, Let's get a move on here. Activate ray!" Kamiya called out. The famous lazer hummed to life, took aim and fired at a familiar target. Mimis boots were immedietly enveloped in the queer radiation and started to increase in size. They ripped down the sides the minuete that Mimi passed beyond any shoe size known to man. Oddly enough, Mimis socks held firm. "That Mimi, always staying at the height of fashion." Kari thought to herself. Soon, Mimis feet were long enough and wide enough so that they almost completely covered the mouth of the hole, thereby providing enough support for Mimi without any real need for the gravity field. Basically, the soles of Mimis feet were now pointing straight up, with her heels slightly overlapping one side of the hole and her giant toes overlapping on the other. Despite their now monumental size, Mimis socks still contained their owners feet and had expanded like plastic trash bags.

"Oh well, the squirrels DID have to examine the product in the movie..." Kamiya was just about to order the Numemon to take off Mimis socks when Kari stopped her. "Wait Mom! This could be all for the better." Kamiya seemed to understand and grinned. It was now time for Mimis song as Kari got on one side of Mimi and Kamiya got on the other with the Numemon forming a huge circle around all three.

and lay down on her cushy soles.

153111112121211121.title: Who says going downhill from here is a bad thing?

1531111121212111212.content:
After a few minutes, Kari and her mother got up from their insole hammocks and stretched out, facing away from each other.

Kari: Well mom, I admit that I had a few doubts about this at the start but I'm really enjoying myself here.

Kamiya: Glad to hear it Kari. Now if I could just find the remote control that I had earlier, then we could move on to the final game.

Kari: Oh, you mean this one.

Kamiya whirled around and stared. Kari was holding a device that looked like a television remote in a matter-of-factly sort of way.

Kari: Yeah, I'm enjoying myself so much that I think that I'm not gona take any chances about who gets the last fate!

Kamiya tried to get around Mimi to try and stop Kari but it was already to late. Kari pointed the remote at her mother and pushed a button. Kamiya disappeared and nearby a pannel opened in the floor and a comfortable looking easy-chair rose into position. Kari understood and sat down. Then she turned on the TV as she wondered what song she should have the Ompah-Numemon sing.

153111112121212222.title: Pipe Dream

1531111121212122221.content:
Kamiya pushed a button on a remote control she held behind her back and four giant plastic cylinders lowered down from the ceiling. They were side by side and see-through.

Kamiya: Okay, girls! Everyone line up. I want to take a picture.

Kari: Alright mom, but don't take too long like last time. Hey wait a sec where's the camera?

Kari asked her question far too late as she found herself sucked up into the air first and following her down the line was Yolie, Sora, and Mimi on the end. with the girls arms and legs pinned together, all they could do in this bizzare situation was turn their heads from side to side. Allowing Kamiya to see the girls expressions clearly.

Kamiya looked up at her captives and thought. "Well we never agreed to use only one person per fate. Before I have my fun though...."

She pushed two more buttons on her handy remote. One caused a giant vaccume cleaner to rise out of the floor and switched on. One by one the girls all lost their shoes and socks to the suction. As the vacume retreated back into the floor, a ray machine rose up in its place and began emmiting a bright colored ray, enveloping each of the girls feet in a bright light. Within seconds everyones feet was as long and broad as barn doors. As Kamiya watched the girls vollyball sized toes wiggle in delight at their newfound freedom, she wondered how she should proceed.
1531111121212122221.title: A plumbers dream

1531111121212122222.content: Will all 4 girls be made into blueberries?

15311111212121222221.content: How big are we talking about here?

153111112121212222211.content:
"Would anyone like some gum?" Kamiya asked nonchlantly, knowing full well what she was doing. Everyone wanted one and immediately poped them in her mouths.
Mimi: So, Mrs. Kamiya, why exactly did you bring us all....
She didn't finish, she was far to mesmerized at the fact that Kari had turned a particularly healthy shade of blue.
Yoie: Uhhh, Mimi? Have you been snacking a lot lately?

Mimi looked at herself and noticed that without her noticing, she had gained a very prominant belly. Similar changes were occuring with the other girls. Yolies' chest was starting to fill out, Karis arms an legs were getting fuller and thicker seemingly becoming one with her body, and Sora was staring in shock at a pair of thunder thighs that would've stopped traffic. Kamiya watched in silent amusement as her daughter and her three friends swelled into four spherical blue balls, gigantic blueberies with practically non-exhistant appenages.

Sora: Wha..What's going on? What happened to us? I..woah. Ah.WOAH!

Sora was in the middle of trying to take stock of their situation when she found that it was getting harder to stand. Before she knew it she had lost her balance completely and toppled over onto her stomach. The other girls could see what the problem was. One of Soras sneakers had been ripped to shreds and the other one was following close behind. Kamiya giggled to herself as she remembered that taking the gum led to some peculiar side effects. She could hardly contain her laughter as the girls floundered around helplessly as their transformation continued. Sora had to point her toes so that their continued expansion didn't tip her any further forward and onto her head, Mimi had tried to waddle a few steps in an attempt to get to saftey, but instead she had toppled over onto her side and now her face was a mixture of deep blue and beet red, Kari and Yolie had both flopped onto their backs.
Kamiya strolled over to Sora and leaned up against her bulbous body.

Sora: Mrs. Kamiya, what happened? Did you do this? Hey where are you going? Don't leave us like this!

Kamiya: Don't worry Sora. I guess that gum was from the discard rack. Oh well, the side effects will wear off soon enough. Meanwhile, I can think of a way to pass the time.

A familiar tune filled the air as Kamiya rolled the girls across the floor untill they were side by side and lying on their backs. Kamiya started singing after she placed herself in front of the four pairs of giant blue bare feet.

Oompa Loompa doompade do
I've got the perfect puzzle for you
Oompa Loompa doompade de
If you are wise you'll listen to me

Eight Berry girls with giant bare feet
will all be sqirming to my music beat
When they are tickled, their laughter is great
They can't escape their ticklish fate!

I love to tickle their feet.

Oompa Loompa doompade dest
Tickling your tootsies is just the best.
You will bring such happiness too
As I tickle, tickle, tickle you too!
153111112121212222211.title: Gumming up the works.

choices: Both girls are subjected to this fate.
15311111212122.content:
Either Yolie or Mimi?

Or perhaps Both?
15311111212122.title: Should this fate be shared?

153111112121222.content:
As the girls continued to look around, Kari began to think to herself.

Kari: Hmm. I could suck them up some pipes and tickle their feet but I might have another idea that could prove to be a little more convienient, and after all, the more the merrier. Oh girls, could I have your attention please?

Yolie, Mimi, and Sora were suddenly all attention.

Yolie: Is this the part where you tell us what we are all doing here.

Kamiya: Well, we brought you here to have some fun basically. A special kind of fun. NOW BOYS!

Yolie and Mimi had failed to notice that several Numemon had gathered up behind each of them and seized them by the arms. Sora was startled by this and dashed behind Kari.

Sora: Kari, what's going on! What did you tell them to do that for?

Kari: Don't worry Sora. Our friends aren't going to get hurt, they're just going to ave a little snack.

Mimi: Oh, wait Kari! I can't snack between meals. That would ruin my figure!

Kamiya: Mimi dear, that will be the least of your worries in a moment.

Kamiya pulled a remote controll out of her pocket and pushed a button. The Numemon took this as thier cue and pulled the girls mouths open. Out of practically nowhere, two long rubber hoses shot out and planted themselves in Mimi and Yolies mouths. The Numemon still held firm as the hose started gushing something into the two digidestined.

Sora was practically shaking Kari at this point.

Sora: Kari, we have to do something! They could suffocate!

Kari: Will you relax?! There's nothing to be worried about. That solution is a special mixture that won't hurt them at all, but it does produce some interesting results. Just enjoy the show and be glad that I wanted to share the next phase of this game with you.

Kari was right about the strange effects. The liquid that the girls were drinking was filling them up in more ways than one. Waists were staring to bulge, limbs were getting chunky and butts were broadening out. However something else was happening.

Sora: Kari, what's happening to them? Why does it look like their feet are swelling up?

Kari: Well, you've heard of the phrase: "Going straight to your hips."? Well, this foumula not only sends whoever drinks it to Sumoville, but it fills up any available space in the feet too. Don't ask me how it works, I just wished for it.

Kari was telling the truth. Mimis' shoes and Yolies' boots were already straining to hold on. The girls drank and drank, swelling bigger and bigger with each gulp of the strange concoction. Finally, the girls began to lose their balance, as their added weight became to much for them. Both started to wobble and sway, causing the Numemon to scramble about and try to catch them. The girls both landed on their rears and the impact was just enough to cause their shoes and socks to blow apart at th same time, leaving the bloated girls barefoot, yet the still continued to drink as their audence looked on.

About this time, Sora was feeling better about the predicament that her two friends were in and after Kari explaineda few more things to her, she began t look forward to the outcome of this force-feeding.

The girls ontinued to gain weight and their feet continued to swell. Their bellies were covering most of their outstretched legs now and their bottoms were getting so big that the girls were actually looking taller, however from the looks on their faces, oth were the most concerned about what was appening to their feet, which were increasing in size and shape as the seconds ticked by, their toes already as big as volleyballs.

Finally, the hoses shut off and retracted and Yolie and Mimi gave a tremendous burp. Although they were both still sitting down, their fat had elevated them to seven ft tall an six ft. wide each! They also still had all of their clothing on, save for their shoes and socks. Their bellies had swollen to such an extent that they had spread the girls legs apart and covered them up to their ankles. As for thier feet, they had grown to a height where the girls big toes were just a little above the girls heads. No one could even imagine what their rear must've looked like.

Kari: Awww. They look so...vulnerable. Well girls, lets chere them up and show them that even though they look like that, we can still have fun!
153111112121222.title: Barefoot blobs.

choices: Kari and Kamiya go for broke and make their feet HUGE!
They come up with something else...
15311112.content:
Kamiya tapped her chin in thought.

"I could shrink them down or..."

Kari blinked, still pinned to the wall by her mom's toes. "...'Or' what?"

Kamiya grinned suddenly. "Or I could go for broke but down a wall or two!"

"Mom!" Kari exclaimed.

"What??" Kamiya asked, a little dismayed. "What's wrong with having some fun?"

"If you did that and people saw, they'd freak out!"

Kamiya shurgged. "Couldn't we just wish they thought it was normal or wish to fix anything we break?"

Kari was about to retort but stopped as she registered what her mother had said. "...wow...why didn't I think of that?"

Kamiya giggled. "So should we do it?"
15311112.title: A change of size.

choices: Their feet get to be bigger than houses...
Their feet get larger than a building!
153111121.content:
Kari smiled. "Yeah, let's go for it! I wish no one would care about how big our feet are!"

Kamiya also smiled, getting excited. "I wish our feet were bigger!"

Before either mother or daughter knew it, the feet began to expand. Kamiya quickly angled her feet enough so Kari could slip in between them so Kari wouldn't be crushed. Soon enough, both mother and daughter's feet where pressing up against the walls, which were starting to crack, creak and groan from the pressure.

*BOOM*

The walls finally buckled as the mammoth feet of the two broke through, reducing the walls to rubble. Kari's feet were expanding out into the living room while Kamiya's were going out where the window used to be.

Just how big do they get?

Their sneakers succumb to the growing.

"Oh oh! my feet are back to their normal size!" said Kari as she went to her room. Kamiya was wearing Reebok Freestyle hightops with white socks so she decided to keep them on as Kari reappeared wearing Reebok basketball midtop sneakers with rainbow toe socks. 15312.content:
Kari is startled by a knock on the door. "Hey Kari, it's Sora!" Kari got on her enlarged feet quickly, but the size zapped her of most her nimbleness, as she made quite the racket. "Are you okay?" questioned Sora curiously.
"Ummmm, yeah." panicked Kari. She was relieved to find that she locked the door to her room. "What do you want?"
"Id like to ask if you could lend me your tennis racket, are you going to let me in or have me shout through the wall?" Kari huffed at her new enlarged feet.
"One moment!" she ordered. Kari had the tennis racket, but does she hide from Sora or tell her friend her incredible wish?
15312.title: "What was that racket?!"

153121.content:
Kari took a deep breath for a moment. Sora is a good friend, she'll either help me get my feet to normal or perhaps she enjoys them. She calmly opened up, with her feet in plain sight. "Thought you'd never open up!" joked Sora. "Anyways, I'll just take the racket and........" she caught eye of Kari's feet. "Wow, I never knew you had such big feet." Kari blushed, as her tone of voice wasn't one of horror.
"I thought I had the biggest, but size 9 compares nothing to those." added Sora again. "How do you fit those in your sneakers?"
"To be honest, they just grew casue I wanted to see what they would look like." smiled Kari.
"You know on a whim."
"Well can I do it too?" asked Sora.
"I dunno, wish and let's see."
Sora closed her eyes and took a deep breath. "Oh I wish I had big feet just like Kari!" she wished giddily. She opened her eyes and......
153121.title: "One big jealousy"

1531211.content:
Sora with a wide grin looked down, but to no avail, her feet were still encased in those size 9 sneakers of hers. "Drats!" she stomped as Kari still had the biggest feet.
"Maybe the magic only works if you're barefoot?" suggested the always benevolent Kari. Sora in desperation would take any measure to get her feet inflated, but Kari's suggestion might have made some sense.
"Hmmm, maybe you're right, good thinking." Kari smiled at the complement, as Sora quickly unlaced and freed her feet from her sneakers and socks. "Okay,here goes nothing!" she again clinched her fists and shut her eyes. "I wish I had a large foot inflation, right now!" Sora opened her eyes and again was disappointed. "Now that's just great." she huffed, letting out a different emotion of aggresssiveness take over.
"Geez, I'm so sorry, Sora" eeped Kari. She walked to her bed,struggled with her balance, finally laying down, giving Sora a wide shot at her large sole. "If you don't mind, I need to lay down."
Kari's feet became a little troubling for her to control, but she loved them anyways. She ignored Sora's presence and wiggled her toes, enjoying her feet, and perhaps wishing them to grow bigger, but she must not inflict jealousy on Sora, who was out of theories to get her feet inflated. She observed Kari's happy feet, and Kari giggled at her toe's. "What's so funny?"
"Oh, nothing, I am just fascinated how big my feet got, you should've seen'em before you got here!" Sora raised her eyebrows at this.
"Go ahead and shove them in my face why dontcha!!!!" she hissed.
"Sora, it's nothing to get angry about. Just be happy that one of us got what we wished for." said a reasoning Kari. Sora shook her head, and an idea lit in her noggin.
"Well, I'll find a way to be happy." she said, sitting on Kari's legs on the bed. Kari was stuck, and could not move.
"Um, Sora, what are you doing?" she asked nervously.
"Im just going to have fun with your big feet instead." she responded, dragging her finger up and down her big sole. Kari bit her lips, but there was no holding back the ticklish situation she was in.
"HeeeheeeheeeSoraheeeeheeeeheee!" she giggled. Sora noticed that Kari's feet were shrinking, as while making figure 8's, the length and width slightly decreased.
"Ahhh, not only a weakness, but an antidote!" she smiled.
"HeeeheeeheeeheeeNOOOOOOOOheeeehheeMYheeheeeFEEEEETTTTHEEEEE!" laughed Kari, noticing that her feet were steadly shrinking the harder she giggled. Sora continued to tickle her feet until they were back to normal size.
"No matter how big or small, still ticklish." she let go of Kari, letting her suffer with her orginal size.
"I don't get it." moped Kari. "Tickling makes them smaller."
"Oh, you'll get over it. Now, we're gunna figure out how they grew and tell the others."
smiled Sora deviously.
1531211.title: "If you can't join them....."

15312111.content:
The Next Day, Sora (Whose feet had returned to normal size) went to Kari's house to pick Kari up for a day of playing sports, Sora still had her tennis shirt and skirt that she wore the night before but she wore different socks and sneakers this time as she had on sky blue Adidas Forum hightops with pink stripes and blue white and pink thick cotton ankle socks. Kari had white thin cotton socks. "I told Yolie and Mimi about our little foot inflation advnture last night. Where's your sneakers Kari?" said Sora. "They are in the washer as I had ran in the mud, do you have a pair of sneakers in your gymbag Sora?" said Kari. "Yes! I got four pairs of sneakers and some spare pairs of socks." replied Sora as she opened the gymbag and picked up a pair of pink and white retro Reebok sneakers. "These Reeboks may be a little too big for your tiny feet but they'll do!" said Sora. "Nice Sneakers and socks Sora, Thanks for the Reeboks!" said Kari as she put the Reeboks on and as Sora said, they were size 09 sneakers. 'You are right, they are too big!" said Kari. "You can wish your socked feet to fit them Reeboks very perfectly!" said Sora. "I wish my feet were big but big enough to fit a size 9 sneaker very perfectly!" said Kari and almost immediately, her Reebok sneaker and sock-clad feet fit the Reeboks perfectly. "Thanks Sora!" said Kari as they left the house. "We are going to the gym to play a sport! You pick the sport to play!" said Kari

Sora chooses

Said Sora, "It's impossible, your sneakers and socks couldn't survive your feet growing but they grew alongn with them" said Kari as she went back to her room to get her socks and sneakers. Kari came back to the room wearing pink Reebok question midtops with white knee socks. "If your sneakers and socks can grow along with your feet, I might as well do the same thing" Said Kari, "Bring it on!" replied Sora. choices: Im more of a Sora type
153121211.content:
Kari and Sora looked down as light shined through the socks and her feet returned to a comfy pillow size. Those pink reebok's stayed in tact, as Kari smiled at her regrown feet and stuck her tounge out at Sora. "See, my shoes can grow too!" she gloated.

"Big deal!" hissed Sora. "I'll just wish for bigger feet!"

"I can always match it!" Sora gave Kari a stink eye at her rebuttle. Kari was right, she had the power to keep up with her. Sora now wanted the biggest feet, and have everyone else worship them. Sora thought, and thought of a brilliant plan.

"Ok girlfriend, we can't both share the glory with larger than life feet, so I suggest we have a contest." she suggested. Kari thought for a second, scratched her chin and nodded.

"Ok, but what type of contest?"

"Simple, since we're both obsessed with keeping our sneakers on, we'll wrestle to get them off each other. Whoever looses the last sock wins, and gets the biggest feet in all the land!" challenged Sora. KAri made two big fists at her side and smiled.

"Then lets dance!" she taunted. They each stroled around each other, waiting for the best time to pounce on her opponent, with their huge feet, pulling off sneakers would be more difficul than normal.

They hesitate, and in equal force, tackle each other to the ground, and.......
153121211.title: Bigger the feet, the bigger the challenge.

choices: Bring all the girls over and show off her big feet
Make Sora's feet even bigger, and tickle them
1531212111.content:
They wrestled each other to the ground, they eached tried to punce at their opponents enlarged feet. Sora is a natural athlete, as she had some good tugs at Kari's pink rebok's. "Gotcha!" yelled Sora, pinning Kari down and tugging at her heel, as her right sneaker fell to the ground.

"MMPPHH! Get off!" struggled Kari, but she found that her ankles were being held down. She is stuck, and they both know it. Sora wasted no time removing her other sneaker.

"Not lookin so tough without your cute Reebok's, eh Kari?" joked Sora. Kari had an advantage with her white knee socks. Sora used her arm to pull down the sock to her ankles, and rip it off. Kari is now one helpless knee sock from losing her big foot supremecy. Kari was too immobile. Her feet were too heavy to lift, as her body was more built for beauty than for athletics.

"Oh no." she gasped.

"How terrible, I really expected more from a Kamiya." Sora shook her head, and realizing that victory was in the bag. "Well, the only feeling better than winning itself is when you get your first taste of it, eh Kar?"

"Just win already, and get off okay!" Kari yelled, still trying to struggle free.

"Oh, I think I'll have a little fun with our lovable runner up first." Sora gave an evil grin and stroked her finger on Kari's nig bare sole.

"Noeeee heeee heee!" Kari turned red, as Sora was humiliating her. "Heeeheeeheeenoeeeee!"

"I shoulda challenged you to a tickling contest, haha! I think I'll take my prize now. Now if I only had a camera." Sora quit tickling Kari at the moment, and tugged some loose sock at Kari's toes, and began to slowly pull off the last knee sock. The moment felt eternal, as Kari finally had a plan.

"If you want big feet that bad, than take it!" she screamed, wishing that Sora had super-sized feet.

"Wow, a quitter!" Sora smiled as she rose to her feet, they became big as sofas, as the addidas sign on her sneakers was as large as Kari's head. Sora ignored that Kari still had half a sock on her left foot. "I think I'll squash the competion!" she lifted her right foot over Kari, who shivered under the huge shadow. The feet have grown beyond Sora's wildest dreams, and unfortunately, her control. Sora fell back on Kari's bed.

"Hmmm." Kari witnessed that Sora had to remain on the bed helplessly, and no one has officially won. Sora's head was between the two couch big feet, still fully covered.

"Hey!" Sora struggled. "Well, now since I have won, do my bidding and tell the world my story!"

"Ahem!" Kari lifted her foot as that knee sock held on. "It seems that you haven't finished the job.

"But you quit!"

"I don't remember saying 'i quit', I just gave you what you wanted, and when I'm done winning the contest, I'll take my big feet out for a stroll!"

"It can't be, HEEELPP!" Sora tried to get up, but it was useless. Kari had a heck of a time unlacing those green addidas, but using dull strength, pulled them to the ground.

"So heavy I can't carry them." she huffed. Now Sora wiggled her desk like toes in her very elastic hot pink ankle socks. Kari decided to feel the texture with her hands. "Cute socks."

"Hahahaha, hey thaaaat tickleeees!" giggled Sora.

"Im sorry did you say something?" Kari whistled while laboring off each sock. "Man, I can fit my family in here!" she thought.

Kari is the official winner! Sora angily banged her feet together and wiggled her toes in defeat.
"Now, with my new title, what to do next?"

Yolie and Mimi went to Kari's place expecting to see Kari and Sora's big feet only saw Sora's huge but shrinking Adidas sneaker clad foot as Kari reentered the room with rainbow toe socks on her feet as she put on her Reeboks. Sora and Kari then saw their sock and sneaker clad feet shrink back to normal size. Sora and Kari went back to the house and were greated by their friends Mimi and Yolie. "Where have you two girls been?" said Mimi. "We were having a friendly contest. It started when I wished for my feet to grow, My Adidas sneakers and hot pink ankle socks grew along with my feet, then Kari did the same thing to her Reebok sneaker and white sock-clad feet." said Sora. "We are going to play some basketball, do you want to play with us?" said Yolie who was wearing Nike hightops with hot pink socks while Mimi wore Fila sneakers with blue tube socks. 1531212112.title: Swell time in the basketball court

153122.content:
Kari thought swiftly how to hide her large feet. She couldn't fit them in any of her now teeny socks or sneakers, but she had to cover them. She unlocked the door, and tip toed into her bed, and went under the covers, as if she was taking a nap. "This is perfect!" she thought. "Come in Sora."
Sora twisted the knob again and was successful. "What took you so long?" she huffed with a cheery smile. Kari tried to put on a sick face, drooping her eyes to make it look like she was asleep.
"Im not feeling so hot, Sora. The racket is on the floor over there." she groaned. Sora nodded. "Go ahead and take it, im feeling a little tired now."
"Ok, but what's wrong?"
"I just, a little sore all over, and fatigued." replied Kari. Sora was in good spirits, and felt obligated to help a friend.
"Well, do you need a hand with anything, you seem a little tense." offered Sora. Kari grew nervous, but as long she had the sheets over her, she was safe.
"All I need is a little rest." Sora scratched her chin.
"I can help you relax, I can give a pretty good massage on your sore spots." Kari was in too deep now.
"I'll be fine, really." winced Kari. Sora shook her head.
"You haven't lived until you have a massage from your's truly." she lifted up the sheets with womanly strength. "Oh my!" gasped Sora. "No wonder you're in such pain. Your feet have swelled."
"No, no, no! Don't worry, it doesnt hurt at all. In fact, I wished for inflated feet, and boom, look at them." explained Kari. Sora observed Kari's big, naked soles and smiled.
"They're cute, Kari." Kari blushed at this as Sora went in for a quick tickle.
"Heehee!" she tittered.
"Yep, they're real." she affirmed. Small footsteps came down the hallway, as Gatomon entered the room.
"I was taking a cat nap, when I heared some laughter, what's going, oh my." Gatomon spotted Kari's enlarged feet.
"Don't worry, Gatomon....." Kari explained the whole story to her feline.
"Well if that's the case, what's granting these wishes?" asked Gatomon.
"We don't know." explained Kari. She experimented by wishing her feet back to normal. They went back to size 7's, as Sora noticed Gatomon's tail ring glow.
"Look!" she pointed. "It's your ring!" they all looked in awe. Gatomon smiled, and realized her power.
"Well, if that's the case, then...."
153122.title: Truth and Lies

1531221.content:
"...I wish Sora and Kari had huge feet!" Gatomon says, giggling as the effects of her wish begin immediately. Blinks, and kicks off her shoes before her feet become too large, but the same cannot be said for her socks as her growing feet makes them burst wide open. "Ooooh...nice..." Sora says, as she rubs the edge of her foot.

At the same time, Kari squeals with delight as her feet get much bigger than they were before. Since Kari's still in a sitting position, Sora and Gatomon are able to get a good view of the soles of Kari's feet. Both pairs of feet keep growing until they're around 4 feet long and 2 feet wide. Kari giggles as she wiggles her pillow-sized toes. "Ahhh...how neat." Kari says.

Gatomon grins. "Whoo, it worked! This should be interesting..." Gatomon says, as she walks over to Kari.

Sora smiles. "Well, we have big feet...what shoudl we do with them?" Sora asks, grinning as she manages to put one of her feet up against Kari's, which causes Kari to blush a little.

"Ahh...well, let's see..." Kari thinks.
1531221.title: Gatomon's selfless wish.

choices: The girls feet shrink to normal
15312211.content:
"...Well," pondered Kari,"Id really like to show off these feet, but I can't really walk well with these big things." She recalled struggling just to hide from Sora. Sora kicked Kari playfully.
"Oh don't be such a wuss." she chuckled. Sora tried to jump to her feet to prove her brevity, but fell to the floor. "Ouch, they are heavy." Sora got to her large feet and sat down next to Kari.
"See what I mean." she joked. "I think it's best we sit and enjoy our big feet." Kari smiled and gave a little play of footsies with Sora, who giggled.
"Haha, yeah, this is all the fun we need." Gatomon snickered wryly at the to girls flirting with each other. They were having all this fun when Gatomon watches, with all the power in her tail ring.
"Im glad that you two are having fun." she said. "But since you don't want to show off what I've given u, you both will be MY pets!" Gatomon gave her devious smile not seen since her previous servitude to Myotismon.
"Gatomon?!" shrieked Kari, suprised to hear her digimon use such a tone. "It's not just you're power, I wished for big feet before you were in here, and it worked." she said.
"Oh yeah, than prove it." said Gatomon.
"Girls, girls, girls! This is lighthearted fun here. We dont have to argue who's power it is, or resort to power drunk torture." interrupted Sora. Kari nodded.
"She's right, let's put who's wish is which behind us."
"Well if you're so sure, prove it." huffed Gatomon. She said she wishes to forbid anymore wishes. Kari smiles.
"Well, in that case, I wish our feet back to normal." she said with contempt. Sora was startled by Kari's behavior, since she was always bright and cheery, not aggressive. The room lacked oxygen, as they all observed......
15312211.title: With great power comes bigger feet

153122111.content:
The wait for the wish felt like hours, but the light shined on the ring, as their feet were back to normal. Kari smiled in her "victory". "See, what did I say." she gloated. She was content, but saddened that her feet weren't big, as was Sora.

"Geez, now im size 9 again!" she pouted.

"Im sorry, Sora, but I had to prove the fact that you can't wish against someone's will." she said. Gatomon scratched her chin, in search of an idea. She had to have Kari more calm and docile like Sora was.

"Well then, Kari, that means you're going to have to comply." said Gatomon. The cat wished silently a needle of a mysterious drug. Before anyone could react, both Sora's and Kari's neck were punctured by a needle.

"Ouch, Gatomon, what was that for?!" screamed Kari.

"Yeah!" followed Sora. "That was painful!"

"Relax you two, that was just a mighty dose of a drug we have in the digital world that makes you happy, giddy, and suggestible to everything." explained Gatomon, who observed the effects immediately. "All you guys need to do is be calm and listen to me, im your friend."

"She's right." smiled Sora gleely. Kari felt an odd sensation go to her head, it felt good, the opposite of a headache. Thinking became foggy and difficult, best to let Gatomon think for you.

"Yeah Gatomon, let's have fun!" chuckled Kari. "What do wish to do?"

"Well.........First, lets get your feet bigger." at her word both Sora and Kari smiled as they loved those pillow sized feet.

"Wow!" smiled Kari in awe.

"What do you say we put those feet in some stocks?" Gatomon suggested, getting no negative answers. Sora and Kari lied side by side on her bed, with their feet encased in wooden stocks, wiggling their toes, and worshiping everything Gatomon did.

"OOOO! Now what!" smiled Sora. Gatomon smiled as her plan was in place, she silently wished a feather behind her back. Sora and Kari couldn't see it anyways, as their feet encased in stocks blocked their view
153122111.title: Always a way past a loophole

Before Kari had even known what had happened, she found herself scrunched against the wall of her room with most of her furniture. Her feet, now being the size of king-sized beds and each of her toes rivaling pillows, had squeezed out most of the space in the room. What was even more curious is the way that her furniture had been pushed against the wall, Kari had no choice but to arch her back so she was leaning foward. Basically Kari's room still had space around the door, but the rest of the room was filled with Kari. So the first thing anyone would see as they came in would be Two supersized soles with Kari's head stuck between the arches."OK I have to stop wishing for a while. Maybe I should try to shrink myself back down to size but there might be some advantages to this."
Just then Kari heard someone coming up the steps. "Oh No" she thought "I forgot that Yolie was coming over to take me to the mall! I can't let her see me like this! What am I going to do?! "Hey Kari are you in heaaaar?" Yolie said as she walked through the door and stood astonished at the spetacle before her. "Don't panic Yolie, let me explain!" Kari said, and she told her the whole story. "Hmmm, this is interesting." thought Yolie as a mischievious smile came to her face. Kari noticed this and asked. "Uh Yolie, why are you looking at me like that?" Yolie turned around, locked the door, and said "As long as you're like this, let's have some fun!
1532.title: Cornered

Change plans: Have a sleepover instead.
15321.content:
Yolie giggles to herself. "Oh, I was just thinking you could use a foot massage, Kari."

Kari just rolls her eyes. "Sure, that's what you say, but your face says otherwise."

"Fine, fine, but I'm sure you'll like a little tickling...besides, I'm sure it won't even be that bad." Yolie pauses. "Besides, you're not in a position to do anything about it."

Kari giggles. "I could always squish you." She says half heartedly, as she sways the foot Yolie is next to back in forth as if she's preparing to to flatten Yolie with it.

"You're bluffing and we both know it, Kari. Now lighten up and let me have my fun." Yolie says, as she prepares to tickle Kari.

"Oh, alright then." Kari sighs, and smiles at her.

As soon as those words come from Kari's mouth, Yolie starts running her hands all over Kari's feet. Kari starts giggling wildly soon after Yolie starts tickling.

Yolie looks over to Kari's head. "So, how is it?" she says, while continuing to tickle Kari.

"Hehe...it's nice...hehehehe." Kari spouts out between fits of giggling.

And so, Yolie continues until her arms get tired. Kari manages to get on her feet so that Yolie can rest on them.

"Whoa...I'm beat. How about you, Kari?" Yolie asks.

Kari nods, letting out the occational giggle. "Yeah...hehe...it'll probably take a few moments for me to catch my breath...you comfy, Yolie?"

Yolie grins, and looks up at Kari. "I'm very comfy, but I'm more concerned about you. Aren't you uncomfortable just standing there?"

"Nuh uh." Kari says, shaking her head for emphasis. "It's pretty cozy, actually."

Suddenly, they hear a knock on the door. "Girls, you've been in there for a while now. Is anything wrong?"

"Ack. I almost forgot that we were supposed to go to the mall." Kari says. "What should we do?"

Yolie hears slience for a moment, and fears that Kari's mom might try to walk in...

"Well, let me check on you girls before I go about my business." Mrs Kamiya says. She turns the doorknob and lets herself in. The first thing Mrs. Kamiya notices is Kari standing on her bed-sized feet.

Instead of getting upset or freaked out, Mrs. Kamiya just giggles a little. "Well, I can certainly see why you've two decided to change your plans...of course, I figured it was something a little less extreme than this...so...what happened?"

1532122212.content:
Kamiya rubs her hands together, thinking of what she could do. "Oooh, I got it! I wish I had a pump that could make feet blow up like balloons!" Kamiya shouts, and sure enough, she gets such a device.

It looks like a standard bicycle pump, but the nozzle on the hose looks something like a suction cup. However, it only has one hose. "Hrum...can't just inflate one foot...I wish the device had 3 more hoses." Kamiya says, watching as the device sprouts 3 more hoses.

Soon enough, Kamiya gets the hoses hooked up to each one of the girl's feet. "Ready, girls?" she asks. Kari and Yolie do their best to shrug. "Alright, here it goes!" Kamiya says, as she presses down on the plunger. The pump seems to be pretty potent, as the first pump caused the girl's feet to double in size.

Satisfied with the results, Kamiya continues to pump up their feet, which get bigger and more bloated with each pump. Dispite how uncomfortable the setup may look, the girls seem to enjoy having their feet pumped up, and giggle a little after each pump.

Once Kamiya gets the girl's feet to the point where their toes touch the ceiling, she disconnects the pump and wishes the stocks away. "So, how does it feel, girls?" asks Kamiya.

Kari manages to get up on her bloated feet. "Well, I think I prefered plain growth, but this has it's advantages. It sort of feels like I have a pair of giant pillows attached to my ankles...except I can feel the pillows." Kari says, ending her last remark with a giggle.

Yolie grins. "I really like it...it would probably feel really good to walk around with big, squishy feet."

"Alright...now...what else to do..."

However right here and now, Kamiya could hardly contain herself as she closely observed Karis and Yolie's feet. The girls themselves had gotten into a small conversation so thay weren't currently paying attention to Kamiya as she stood there staring. "They probably feel as good to touch as the girls do to feel them". She thought to herself " Oh, What the heck! I wish the stocks were back!" Kamiya practically yelled. "What?" Kari asked as her attention was grabbed by the sudden outburst from her mother, but it was too late. With a POOF, Kari and Yolie were back in the stocks and were gagged for good measure. Kamiya smiled as she gazed at this slightly familiar specticle. She couldn't even see the girls anymore, their gigantic feet were in the way! "Now I have to decide how I'm going to tickle these economy sized kickers> Said Kamiya.

She was in a large room that looked like the inside of a football stadium, only with no field, no bleachers, and no outside opening in the celing to let the air in, even though she could breath perfectly well. The place was well-lit as well, even though there was no physical light source. The floors, walls and ceiling were all made of a shiny, almost reflective steel that oddly wasn't cold to the touch. Kari was still in the same position as she was before, with her head in between her two enormous feet, and as she looked around the room she saw Kamiya and Kari in the same position, on other sides of the room, looking as clueless as she was. It was then that she noticed that Sora was not among them. It was then that she heard...chuckling?
Looking upward towards the source of the sound, Kari was et was a most unusual site. The ceiling was changing! Pushing outward and changing shape as if something was pushing at it from the other side. A few minuets later, the ceiling had taken on a resemblance of a human head. "Sora!" Kari practically shouted. It was true! Sora's grinning face leered down at the three girls as a pair of arms formed in the ceiling just as the head did, each one the size and length of a mack truck. Sora had apparently brought them all to a place where she was in total control, and Kari watched as Sora picked up Yolie in one hand, smiling as she did so. Sora's hand was so large that it fit easily around Yolie, holding her around the heels so that her head was above Sora's pointer finger sothat she could breathe. Sora began to tickle Yolie's feet with the pointer finger on her other hand ,and Yolie flexed and scrunched her feet and wiggled her toes in protest while she laughed wildly, compleatly at Sora's mercy. After a few minuets, Sora set Yolie down and thought of what to do next.

Sure enough, such a pump appears in front of Kamiya and Yolie. The pumps look just like bicycle pumps, as do the hoses. Yolie and Kamiya take their pumps and stick the end of the hose into one of Kari's feet, and start pumping.

Kari giggles as she feels her feet slowly bloat up. "Ooooh...that feels tingly..." she says. The two stop when each of Kari's feet are the size of a small bed, and lay down on them.

Kari began to feel rather nervous as Yolie got that peculiar look in her eye. "I always knew that Yolie was a little wierd but suddenly I get the feeling that I'm going to learn exactly how wierd". Yolie pulled a chair out from the wreakage of the room and placed it in front of Kari. As she stood up on the chair, Kari noticed that Yolie was carrying a small beaker filled with purple fluid in her hand. "Well Kari, she said, I'm aware that you and I are best friends but one of the reasons I came over here is because I needed a guenei pig to test out my newest discovery from the chem lab at school. It's a special chemical that dulls the brain and causes those under its spell to become giddy and carefree. I needed a human test subject and it's perfectly safe because I have an antidote too, so open up! She grabed Kari's nose and pulled her mouth open. Kari barely stifled a giggle as her hair tickled the arches of her feet. She began to swallow the fluid and she immediatly felt the effects as it went down her throat.
Kari had never been drunk before but with her last remaining senses she thought this feeling she had was very close to it. As she finished drinking Kari began to feel sleepy,giddy, and intoxicated all at the same time. "How do you feel Kari?" Yolie asked mockingly "How should I supposed to feel? Kari asked "Good, now are you ready for a song?" "Oh joy! Kari said. With that Yolie brought out a cassete tape she had in her pocket and put it into Kari's radio. Kari could barely think as Yolei approched one of her feet. "Don't worry too much. The potion will keep the tickling from becoming intolerable."

Kari simply giggled as Yolei started tickling her feet. Yolei started slow, only running a few fingers up and down Kari's feet. Soon, Yolei used one hand, then both hands.

Kari breaks into a laugh as Yolei wiggles her fingers along her feet. "Ahh...more Yolei..." Kari says. Yolei nods, and wiggles her fingers faster.

After around 30 minutes of tickling each of Kari's feet, Yolei decides to take a break. "Ahh...that was fun...how are you doing, Kari."

Kari turns her head towards Yolei and smiles to her. "Great. It's so fun, Yolei..." Kari says.

"That's good, Kari. It's no fun when you're not having fun, right?" Yolei says, as she walks over to Kari, then between her feet so she could get to the rest of her body. She then hugs Kari. "You're such a great friend, Kari. Thank you for putting up with this..."

Let's just go for a walk.

"I wish I could find out how to make your feet even bigger, but I suppose I have to give you the antidote to get that out of you, so...down the hatch." Yolei pours the antidote down Kari's mouth just before her feet start growing again.

Yolei feels Kari's feet squeeze her, and just then notices that they are growing. "Oh my! I must have been something I said...hehehe..."

Kari regains her rational thought, and decides to hug Yolei back. "Aww...thank you too, Yolei." Kari says, giggling as her toes touch the ceiling.

Yolei looks up at Kari's feet, and smiles. "Wow, if we keep this up, your feet will be all that you're made of...in fact...hehe...that gives me and idea on something to do with you." Yolei smiles. "Now, if I'm right, all I have to do is wish for something and it'll happen, apparently. So...Kari, I wish that all you are is your head and your feet."

Before Kari can react to what Yolei said, her entire body glows. Yolei watches in joy as Kari's arms sink into her torso while her legs sink into her feet. From There, Kari's body shrinks down until her giant ankles are where the base of her head used to be. "Whoa...this feels strangely nice..." Kari says.

Yolei smiles. "Ooh, and you look wonderful...well, except for your head...but I can fix that...I wish your head was half as big as both your feet". Kari's head begins to glow, then it gets bigger until it's half as big as her head. "There, perfect." Says Yolei.

Kari giggles. "Ahh...I'll say...this feels even better, now."

Yolei has a wide smile on her face. "Oooh...I can't stand it anymore...I wish I was just like you, Kari." Yolei says. From there, Yolei's smile goes almost ear to ear as her head and feet grow while the rest of her starts to vanish into the parts that are growing.

The first thing Yolei does when the transformation is complete is wiggle her toes. "Hehe...I could stay like this for a long time...but not in the room...it's so crouded in here, what, with our feet nearly filling up all the space..."

Kari nods. "I wish we were outside, then." The next thing the girls know, they are in the middle of the parking lot outside"

Yolei smiles, and steps over to Kari and locks toes with her. "So, Kari, since I've done everything so far, why don't you pick something to do?"

Kari smiles to Yolei, and giggles a bit. "You know, I'm feeling like going for a walk now..."

Yolei smiles back to Kari. "Wow, Kari. You are out of it. Your feet are barely too big to move around in this room, let alone walk out the door with. But that does give me an idea on something we will be able to do."

As she finishes her last sentence, Yolei takes off her shoes and socks, and wiggles her bare toes, then sits down on the floor and tries her best to put her feet up against Kari's. "I want to have big feet just like you, Kari."

Kari thinks for a moment, then gets a dopey smile on her face. "Nope. Haven't a clue." she says.

Yolei sweatdrops, and giggles to herself. "Well, I guess I'm going to have to give you the antidote if I want to join you, so..." Yolei stands up and walks over to Kari's head, then takes the antidote vial and then pours it into Kari's mouth. Within moments, Kari regains rational though.

Kari smiles. "Wow, that was certainly interesting." Kari though for a moment. "By the way, that was a cute song, Yolei."

Yolei sweatdrops, and speaks in a sarcastic tone. "I guess the antidote has failed..." She says with a smirk.

Kari lets out a short giggle. "Seriously, I'm back to normal, and the song was pretty interesting."

"So, are we going to spend all day talking about my chart topping toe song, or what?" Yolei says, as she leans her back against Kari's left foot."

Kari blinks, and sweatdrops. "Oh yeah. I almost forgot." Kari then giggles, and wiggles her toes a bit. "Well, all I did was wish for my feet to be bigger, and well, you see the result."

With that said, Yolei gets her feet lined up with Kari's. "Alright, here it goes...I wish my feet were as big as Kari's." Seconds after Yolei says that, her feet start glowing and growing as well. Yolei squeals in delight. "Ooh, this is going to be fun, Kari..."

A few minutes pass, and Yolei's feet reach the same size as Kari's. Yolei ends up in the same position as Kari, so now they are face to face and toe to toe.

Yolei smiles coyly to Kari. "Hi, Kari." She then giggles, realizing that she had just said Kari's first name in full.

Kari's face lights up. "Aww...how sweet, Yolei." Kari smiles, and playfully footies Yolei. Yolei giggles, and responds the same way. The sounds of their toes thumping against each other fill the room.

After a half hour of this, Kari and Yolei end up wrapping their toes together. "Wow, I've heard of holding hands..." Kari says.

"...but this is much more fun." chimes Yolei. Kari responds with a giggle. "Yeah, it is, Yolei." Kari says.

Yolei grins. "Now, if only we had more room..."

"Ok, then. I wish we were outside." Kari says. Sure enough, the girls are quickly teleported outside, finding themselves standing on their feet.
1532221.title: Giant Footsies.

15322211.content:
Kari takes a few moments to wiggle her toes in the grass. "I still want to go on that walk, Yolei." Kari says.

Yolei scratches her head. "I'm not even sure that we can..."

Kari smiles. "Well, there's only one way to find out, Yolei." Kari prepares to take a step, however, she ends up putting too much force into it, and walks one step before falling forward.

Yolei giggles, thinking that Kari's feet were simply too heavy. "See, I told you they're to heavy to walk with." Yolei says.

Kari says nothing, and pushes herself back on her feet with very little effort, then walks forward, her feet making loud thump sounds as she goes, then, she turns around, and looks to Yolei. "Still think they're too heavy?" Kari says, with a smirk.

Yolei giggles. "They're either fairly light, or the wish made you strong enough to walk normally with them."

"I'll just have to test that, then." Kari says, as she scans the area for something to attempt to crush. She ends up finding a run down and windowless car. "Just perfect." Kari says, as she goes over to the car and holds her foot next to the car. She then presses down...
15322211.title: The *Thump-Thump* of giant feet.

153222111.content:
Kari lets her foot fall on the car, and ends up smashing it flat with a loud crunch sound. "Wow, and that was using one foot." Kari says, smiling as she walks back to where Yolei is standing.

Yolei giggles, and hugs Kari. Kari responds by hugging back. "Ahh...I guess we should go on the walk now." Kari says, eager to see how it would feel to go on a long walk with her massive feet.

Yolei nods, and lets go of Kari. "Alright. Besides, I want to test out my feet as well." The two girls then move onto the road and go on their way.

For about a mile, the girls simply walk along, giggling as the people stare in either shock or amazement as they pass, causing the immediate area to be filled with the thumping of their feet. Then, Yolei gets an idea. "Hey, Kari, let's try running. It'll be fun." Yolei says.

Kari shakes her head to this. "As much as it would be, we would probably end up squishing a lot of people. Besides, think of how much we'd have to pay to get our huge footprints out of the pavement...but that doesn't mean we can break out into a run once we hit the country side." Kari says, then adds, "It shouldn't take too long, anyway. Thanks to our feet, we're able to move further with each step than we could normally."

Yolei sighs a little. "I suppose you're right, Kari." She says, as they continue their walk through the city.

Eventually, Kari and Yolei reach the country side. They pause for a moment, mostly to get a feel for the terrain. Kari giggles as she wiggles her toes, which ends up making large toe shaped marks in the soft earth. "You ready, Yolei?" Kari asks.

Yolei nods. "As ready as I'll ever be." Yolei says. Then, the girls count the three, the take off. They start with a jog, but after a few seconds of that, they break out into a run, leaving large and deep footprints in the ground as they run along.

The girls get around 30 miles away from the city in thirty minutes of walking. "Whoo...that was great." Yolei says as she looks back, only able to see their footmarks down the path. "We must be miles away from town...this would be an excelent way to get to work. That is, it would be if we didn't leave so many footprints in our wake."

Kari giggles, and elbows Yolei. "You know how to make that happen, Yolei."

Yolei nods. "Yes. I wish our feet were only as heavy as they normally are." Yolei says. She then tests it out by attempting to make a mark in the ground with her toes, but ends up making several soft thumps. "There. Now we can run without squishing people." Yolei says.

Kari nods, and sits down on the ground and exposes the soles of her feet, then gets into the same position she was in when Yolei found her in her room. "So, ready for some more fun?"

"I'm always ready, Kari." Yolei says, as she sits down and pushes her soles against Kari's. Then they footsy each other again. "Ahh...how about we do one more thing, Kari?"

"And what would that be, Yolei?" Kari says. Yolei responds by giving Kari a kiss on the lips. Kari blushes, but lets Yolei hold the kiss for as long as she wants.

Yolei breaks the kiss for a moment, and grins. "So...bigger now?"
153222111.title: Big Feet = Big Distance.

1532221111.content:
Kari nods. "Oh, yeah! In fact, I have a couple ideas!" she says.

Yolie smiles. "Alright, Kari. Tell me your ideas, then."

"Alright, I'm torn between making my feet bigger than the biggest mountain, and making both of our feet incredibly long while leaving them at their current width and stuff." Kari says.

"Oooh...those are both great ideas..." Yolie says, grining as widely as she can.
1532221111.title: Kari's goes to extremes.

15322211112.content:
"I'm not sure why, but making our feet long sounds very interesting...let's do it!" Yolie says. Kari nods to Yolie. "I wish our feet would...lengthen until I want them to stop!" Kari yells happily.

Yolie grins, and looks up to see their feet stretch towards the sky. The two giggle as their lengthening feet rub against each other. Eventually, the ticklish feeling starts to dull enough for them so that they can control their giggling. "Mmmmm...this is absolutely the best..."


Kari grins. "I figured you'd love something like this, Yolie." Kari says, as she kisses Yolie. Yolie girns around the kiss. "Mmmm...you are such a wonderful girl, Kari." She says, as they embrace each other, and start to toe thump each other.

After they're done with their own special way of making out, they look up at their feet again, which are now 10 miles long. "So...how long do you want them to be, Kari?" Yolie asks.

"Well, since I picked what we're doing, why don't you pic when we stop?" Kari asks.

Yolie giggles. "That sounds like a wonderful idea, Kari! Now...where to stop..."
15322211112.title: A growing tower of feet!

153222111122.content:
"Kari, I'm so glad you asked me to choose. To be honest...I don't want this to stop! I've never felt so wonderful in my life...I want to spend the rest of...well, forever with you, just like we are now...with our feet getting longer and longer every moment." Yolie explains.

Kari smiles, and puts one of her arms around Yolie. "I figured you'd say something like that, so that's why I let you choose." Kari says. "Now...I wish our feet would grow long forever, I wish me and Yolie could live forever, and so that we don't accidently cancel the wishes somehow, I wish that the last two wishes were unbreakable, and unchangable."

The girls glow for a few moments. "Ok...let's see if this works...I wish me and Kari were back to normal." Yolie says...but the only thing that occurs is the lengthing of their feet. "Alright! Now...let me see if this wish will work...I wish me and Kari were in a nice, cozy place where we can spend eternity in peace." says Yolie. Sure enough, the two girls are wisked off to someplace.

And that someplace was a soft, grass green world that is seemingly made out of foam rubber. The sky is currently partly cloudy Kari tilts back so that she see outside. "Wow...this place looks wonderful...and it feels so nice. My heels were starting to get sore from the hard earth. Where are we, anyway?"

Yolie giggles. "Well, I wasn't specific about where, but we seem to be in a manifistation of the world of my dreams."

"There doens't seem to be much here, Yolie..." Kari says, noticing that the place was the same foam field all around and to the horison.

Yolie grins. "You know me, Kari. It wasn't what was in my dream as much as it was what I was doing in my dream."

"Interesting...did you have a dream of us just like this?" Kari asks.

"I've had similar, but none exactly like this, since...well, this is better than anything I could think of." Yolie says. "Anyway, ready for more fun?" Yolie asks.

Kari nods, and they both pull themselves back in between the arches of their feet and put their arms around each other as they thump their toes together.

-----

Epiloge:

What's there to say? The girls lived happily every after, content with the eternal lengthing of their feet.
153222111122.title: How sweet...

While Yolie and Kari were growing closer as well as bigger, neither was aware that they were being watched very closely. Not to far away in the shadows of one of the buildings that the girls passed earlier lurked a sinister Digimon that both Kari and Yolie were familiar with. She was about 6ft tall with pure white hair had a gruesome face and six spindily legs. Her name was Arukennimon, an ultimate level spider Digimon who used to spend her time seeking out chaos in any of it's forms. These days however she just wandered from place to place trying to find ways to ease her boardom. When she saw Kari and Yolie acting in love and with their feet the size of volkswagons she couldn't help but hatch a plan to get a little revenge.
Meanwhile, Kari had lost herself in Yolie's eyes. She had never admitted it to another human soul but she atually had deep feelings for Yolie and Yolie for her. Both were so caught up in each others gaze, that neither noticed that Arukennimon was swiftly and gently tying the girl's hands behind their backs as well as applying patches of super sticky silk to the backs of the girl's shirts. Before either could comprehend what was happening, they were both lying flat on their backs stuck to the grass.and unable to move. Arukennimon stood over her victims as they began to sweat profusely realizing the situation that they were in. It was then that Arukennimon noticed the vial of potion in Yoile's pocket and grabbed it. "Hey wait!" Yolie piped up "You don't know what that is!" "Well then" Arukennimon replied maybe I should test it.... ON YOU!"

"Oh I don't think you'll be able to stop yourselves." their captor grinned. With that she lifted two of her back legs into the air and very gently scraped them along the soles of Kari's and Yolie"s mammoth feet. The instant the girls erupted into hysterical laughter, Arukennimon closed in and gave each girl a healthy amount. As Yolie began to fall under the effects of her own design, she saw spots before her eyes, her tummy felt like a warm blanket and the clouds overhead began to take on interesting shapes. Kari was felling pretty much the same thing, feeling lethargic and woozy as if she haddn't a care in the world.
As Kari and Yolie drifted of into their respective wonderlands, Arukennimon had spun a feather out of her silk thread and stood in front of the girls XXXL sized feet. "I'm sure this will be fun" she said to herself. She decided to start with...
